titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives on support for Georgia.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives on support for Georgia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Eurasia, and Emerging Threats.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: Expresses the sense that the House of Representatives: (1) reaffirms Georgia's sovereignty and territorial integrity within its internationally recognized borders, (2) does not recognize the independence of the Abkhazia and South Ossetia regions currently occupied by the Russian Federation, and (3) supports efforts to provide for Georgia's defense of its people and sovereign territory.
